title: nAthan tAL
sahitya:
nAthan tAL tuNai nammai ellaam kAkkum naTamiDat-tUkkum


anupallavi

  mAtA pArvati mAl maTrOr tudi muraiyiDavuNDa karai viDakkaNDa


caraNam    anai tandai guru enum mUvar kaN kaNDa kaDavuLar avar
manam varundap-punneri pughuvadu narakaLittu viDum
vIN manappaTru piravikk-Evittu meyyuNarttaghaTru
minnal vAzh nAL innal kANAi veLLi malaivaLar vaLLal malaimagaL
